member.name: T:TheBoxSoftware.API.LiveDocumenter.CRefTypes
member.summary: An enumeration of the available types of element that can be referenced by a cref path in the xml code comments for an assembly.

member.name: F:TheBoxSoftware.API.LiveDocumenter.CRefTypes.Namespace
member.summary: Represents a cref link to a namespace; these can not have commented directly but can be referenced.

member.name: F:TheBoxSoftware.API.LiveDocumenter.CRefTypes.Type
member.summary: Represents a path to a type defined in this or another assembly.

member.name: F:TheBoxSoftware.API.LiveDocumenter.CRefTypes.Property
member.summary: Represents a path to a property in a type.

member.name: F:TheBoxSoftware.API.LiveDocumenter.CRefTypes.Field
member.summary: Represents a fully qualified path to a field in a type.

member.name: F:TheBoxSoftware.API.LiveDocumenter.CRefTypes.Method
member.summary: Represents a fully qualified path to a method in a type.

member.name: F:TheBoxSoftware.API.LiveDocumenter.CRefTypes.Event
member.summary: Represents a fully qualified path to an event.

member.name: F:TheBoxSoftware.API.LiveDocumenter.CRefTypes.Error
member.summary: The compiler when generating the path could not resolve the type.

member.name: T:TheBoxSoftware.API.LiveDocumenter.ContentEntryCollection

member.returns: The ContentEntry at the specified index.

member.name: P:TheBoxSoftware.API.LiveDocumenter.ContentEntryCollection.Count

member.name: T:TheBoxSoftware.API.LiveDocumenter.DocumentationException
member.summary: Details an exception with the documentation.

member.name: T:TheBoxSoftware.API.LiveDocumenter.TableOfContents
member.summary: Provides access to the table of contents for .

member.name: M:TheBoxSoftware.API.LiveDocumenter.TableOfContents.GetDocumentationFor(System.Int64,System.String)
member.summary: Retrieves the XmlDocument for the provided .
member.param: The unique Entry.Key to retrieve the documentation for.
member.returns: The ContentEntry for the specified Key, or null if not found.
member.exception: Thrown when the key provided does not resolve to a member in the documentation.
Thrown when the Load method was not called, call the Load method first.
member.remarks: Keys are generated each time a documentation set is produced, there is no gaunrentee that between each load the key will be the same. If you are looking for a stable reference use cref paths and the method.

member.name: M:TheBoxSoftware.API.LiveDocumenter.TableOfContents.GetDocumentationFor(System.String)
member.summary: Retrieves the XmlDocument for the provided .
member.param: The CRefPath to retrieve the documentation for.
member.returns: The ContentEntry for the specified crefpath or null if not found.
member.exception: Thrown when the key provided does not resolve to a member in the documentation.
Thrown when the provided does not parse correctly.
The provided was null or empty.
Thrown when the Load method was not called, call the Load method first.

remarks.para: A cref path is a way of determining a unique identifier for a type and is generated by the XML documentation compiler when XML comments are produced.
You can retrieve cref paths easily in the API by finding the element you want to GetDocumentationFor from the table of contents.

member.name: M:TheBoxSoftware.API.LiveDocumenter.TableOfContents.Search(System.String)
member.summary: Searches the documentation and returns a list of ContentEntrys that match the search term.
member.returns: A list of ContentEntrys or an empty list if none are found.

member.name: P:TheBoxSoftware.API.LiveDocumenter.TableOfContents.Item(System.Int32)
member.summary: Gets the ContentEntry at the specified index.
member.param: The zero-based index of the ContentEntry to return.
member.returns: The ContentEntry at the specified index.

member.name: P:TheBoxSoftware.API.LiveDocumenter.TableOfContents.Count
member.summary: Returns the number of top level elements in this .

member.name: P:TheBoxSoftware.API.LiveDocumenter.TableOfContents.IsReadOnly
member.summary: Indicates if the collection is read only.

member.name: T:TheBoxSoftware.API.LiveDocumenter.Documentation
member.summary: The Documentation class provides access to methods which allow you to load and obtain information and documentation from a documentation file.

remarks.para: A Documentation instance is an accessor to the documentation file, it enables you to access information such as the table of contents for the documentation or documentation for a single type/member.
A documentation file is a .NET managed code DLL, Visual Studio Solution/Project or a Live Documenter project file (.ldec).
All returned results are provided in XML format, the specification for this format can be found here.

member.name: M:TheBoxSoftware.API.LiveDocumenter.Documentation.#ctor(System.String)
member.summary: Initialises an instance of the Documentation class.
member.exception: Thrown when the provided parameter is null or empty.

member.name: M:TheBoxSoftware.API.LiveDocumenter.Documentation.Load
member.summary: Initialises the state of the documentation class and prepares it so documentation can be accessed.

remarks.note: The load method, loads the documentation in to memory. Instantiating documentation can be a memory intensive activity, where possible you should create cacheing mechanisms to only retrieve documentation when it has changed.

exception.para: The provided file [{0}] and extension is not supported.
The documentation file that the class was instantiated with is not a supported format.

member.name: M:TheBoxSoftware.API.LiveDocumenter.Documentation.GetTableOfContents
member.summary: Obtains the details of the Entries for the currently loaded documentation.
member.exception: Thrown when the Load method was not called, call the Load method first.

member.name: M:TheBoxSoftware.API.LiveDocumenter.Documentation.GetDocumentationFor(System.Int64)
member.summary: Retrieves the XmlDocument for the provided .
member.param: The unique Entry.Key to retrieve the documentation for.
member.exception: Thrown when the key provided does not resolve to a member in the documentation.
Thrown when the Load method was not called, call the Load method first.
member.remarks: Keys are generated each time a documentation set is produced, there is no gaunrentee that between each load the key will be the same. If you are looking for a stable reference use cref paths and the method.

member.name: M:TheBoxSoftware.API.LiveDocumenter.Documentation.GetDocumentationFor(System.String)
member.summary: Retrieves the XmlDocument for the provided .
member.param: The CRefPath to retrieve the documentation for.
member.exception: Thrown when the key provided does not resolve to a member in the documentation.
Thrown when the provided does not parse correctly.
The provided was null or empty.
Thrown when the Load method was not called, call the Load method first.

remarks.para: A cref path is a way of determining a unique identifier for a type and is generated by the XML documentation compiler when XML comments are produced.
You can retrieve cref paths easily in the API by finding the element you want to GetDocumentationFor from the table of contents.

member.name: M:TheBoxSoftware.API.LiveDocumenter.Documentation.GetDocumentationFor(TheBoxSoftware.API.LiveDocumenter.ContentEntry)
member.summary: Retrieves the XmlDocument for the provided .
member.param: The ContentEntry to get the documentation for.

member.name: M:TheBoxSoftware.API.LiveDocumenter.Documentation.GetDocumentationFor(TheBoxSoftware.Documentation.Entry)
member.summary: Retrieves an XML representation of the documentation specified by .
member.param: The Entry to obtain documentation for.

member.name: P:TheBoxSoftware.API.LiveDocumenter.Documentation.IsLoaded
member.summary: Indicates if the documentation is loaded and is ready to be used.

member.name: T:TheBoxSoftware.API.LiveDocumenter.EntryNotFoundException

member.name: T:TheBoxSoftware.API.LiveDocumenter.CRefPath
member.summary: Class that handles and parses a CRef comment path. A CRef path can contain a fully qualified link to a type, property, method etc in an assembly.

member.name: M:TheBoxSoftware.API.LiveDocumenter.CRefPath.#ctor
member.summary: Initialises a new instance of the CRefPath class.

member.name: M:TheBoxSoftware.API.LiveDocumenter.CRefPath.Parse(System.String)
member.summary: Parses the provided path and returns a populated cref path instance.
member.exception: The specified path was null or empty.

member.name: M:TheBoxSoftware.API.LiveDocumenter.CRefPath.Parse
member.summary: Parses the contents of the contained path and stores the details in the classes properties.

member.name: M:TheBoxSoftware.API.LiveDocumenter.CRefPath.ParseType
member.summary: Extracts the cref type portion of the string and sets the .
member.exception: Thrown when the parser finds a type that it can not handle.

member.name: M:TheBoxSoftware.API.LiveDocumenter.CRefPath.ToString
member.summary: Returns a string representation of this CRefPath.
member.returns: The cref path constructed from the elements.

member.name: P:TheBoxSoftware.API.LiveDocumenter.CRefPath.PathType
member.summary: Indicates the type of element that is referenced by the CRef path.

member.name: P:TheBoxSoftware.API.LiveDocumenter.CRefPath.Namespace
member.summary: Gets or sets a string that indicates the namespace the type parsed from the cref path resides in.

member.name: P:TheBoxSoftware.API.LiveDocumenter.CRefPath.TypeName
member.summary: Gets or sets a string that indicates the name of the type from the CRef path.

member.name: P:TheBoxSoftware.API.LiveDocumenter.CRefPath.ElementName
member.summary: Gets or sets a string that is the value of the element name from the cref path.

member.name: P:TheBoxSoftware.API.LiveDocumenter.CRefPath.Parameters
member.summary: A string representing the parameter section of the CRefPath.

member.name: T:TheBoxSoftware.API.LiveDocumenter.ContentEntry

member.summary: Retrieves a list of the parent entries for this ContentEntry

member.name: P:TheBoxSoftware.API.LiveDocumenter.ContentEntry.CRefPath
member.summary: Gets the unique crefpath for this documentation entry.

member.name: P:TheBoxSoftware.API.LiveDocumenter.ContentEntry.Key
member.summary: Gets the key for this documentation entry.

member.name: P:TheBoxSoftware.API.LiveDocumenter.ContentEntry.SubKey
member.summary: Gets the subkey for this documentation entry.

member.name: P:TheBoxSoftware.API.LiveDocumenter.ContentEntry.DisplayName

member.name: P:TheBoxSoftware.API.LiveDocumenter.ContentEntry.IsContainer
member.summary: Indicates if this type is a container entry or a member entry.

member.name: P:TheBoxSoftware.API.LiveDocumenter.ContentEntry.Children
member.summary: Gets a reference to the collection containing a sequence of child ContentEntrys for this entry.

member.name: P:TheBoxSoftware.API.LiveDocumenter.ContentEntry.Parent
member.summary: Gets a reference to the parent entry.

member.name: P:TheBoxSoftware.API.LiveDocumenter.ContentEntry.HasComments
member.summary: Indicates if the member has XML comments associated with it.

member.name: P:TheBoxSoftware.API.LiveDocumenter.ContentEntry.Entry
